summary: Adds a new , equal looking , light armor set, to be foundin a Custom Cave with the coc 01Cave command.
descriptionHtml:
Since I didnt like the Dragonscale Light Armor and it misfits the daedric weapons , I just threw this together rather quickly. Its my first mod and fairly basic. I have Updated it so now you can get it by Crafting (Daedric Armor Perk Required) and you can Enchant + Temper it.

If anyone could spare the time, I am looking for someone talented in Modeling and Texturing to actually make it look light, as its is just a workaround right now.
author: freakysteo
